description: Your electronic gadgets should fit seamlessly into your life, not rule it. Organize your gear with this iPad messenger bag from V7, tailored specifically for the way you live. Constructed of durable and stain-resistant 300D polyester material, this bag snugly fits and protects your iPad or other tablet computers up to 10.1 inches in size, with enough room to accommodate your additional accessories. The plush lining inside the bag's pocket optimally protects your iPad's screen and finish. Three pockets - two exterior and one interior - and multiple compartments store keys, phone, cables and other productive essentials. A sturdy strap adjusts for comfortable over-the-shoulder or cross-body carry.
title: V7 Premium Messenger Carrying Case for 10.1-Inch iPad and Tablet (TD21BLK-1N)
